title: Sharon Horgan | Dramatic Jan. 6 Hearing Issues Trump Subpoena, Hints at Criminal Referrals: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the January 6 committee voting to subpoena Trump while also hinting at possible criminal referrals for key figures involved in the coup and revealing new evidence from the Secret Service corroborating key details about the insurrection.

Then, Sharon Horgan talks about meeting Pierce Brosnan right before her interview, writing, producing and starring in the series Bad Sisters and her daughters' honest criticism of her work.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
